Text.val: Creation date 22.11.2002 (SCR2538, isolated debtor selection part of OSP005)
22.10.2003 JJ SCR4591 added selection DEBC_DATDELETE = null
Program supports selection of DEBC by entering DEBC_DEBH and/or DEBC_DEBC
If only one DEBC row is found conforming to the search parameters it is
If more than one row is found the user is presented with a selection screen
If more than 1 record conforms to the search parameters allow/force
